text:
@kimguilfoyle @JoeBiden 1/COVID19 cases R in the rise!
“Moms”don’t want 2put their families in danger!
#GOPPOS want 2limit ALL liability 4 businesses/institutions re COVID19 safety measures...which is total bs!
Bc right now any institution/company that takes reasonable measures is already protected! https://t.co/M3dGZWpFmj
